title: Pura Veda Ayurveda, Yoga, Meditation, and Mindful Archery, COSTA RICA
description: Feel empowered by joining one of our in person yoga teacher trainings in Costa Rica or one of our online courses. Yoga, Meditation, Mindfulness and Archery are all made available to help you create balance and well being in your life.
cleaned_text: Yoga Teacher Training 200 Yoga Teacher Training 200 Ayurveda Cooking Immersion Traditionally, students learned yoga from living with their guru in a gurukulam. Teachings were delivered in dialogue and further reinforced by the experiences in daily living. Pura Veda Gurukulam is modeled after this style of learning, you will understand the many facets of yoga as yoga becomes your being. This 200 hr teacher training deepens your personal practice and provides you with the tools to carry your students on their own transformative journey with yoga. Ayurveda Cooking Immersion In this Level 1 immersion course, we will explore how to cook meals that are balancing to the 3 doshas, how to recognize imbalances and how to achieve balance through foods. Not only will you leave this course with an understanding of Ayurvedic principles to achieve optimal health, this immersion is designed to strengthen your awareness and connection to your mind/body through daily yoga asanas, controlled breathing, meditation and other mindful practices. By increasing this awareness, you will be better able to identify imbalances and allow your intuition to guide your cooking. Spiritual Warrior Archery Course The path of the Spiritual Warrior is to consistently prepare to face the universal enemy: self-ignorance. In this 3 day workshop you will employ archery, yoga and meditation to bring awareness to who you truly are. Awareness brings to the conscious mind the subtle message that something is not quite right with the way we are living. Follow this awareness into a conscious exploration of the self by deconstructing the labels, intentions, thoughts, images, words, emotions and feelings which are believed to be you. "I just want to say a huge thank you to you and everyone involved in making the course such a wonderful and life-affirming experience. I feel so lucky to have had the opportunity to spend the last three weeks in your jungle paradise, its an experience that has changed my life for the better. " Sean Powers completed the July 2021 teacher training. He dedicated a podcast to speak about his experience. Learn the Fundamentals of Ayurveda, Mind Body Awareness, Self Diagnosis Tools and Cooking to Balance Dosha through our 5 day immersion experience. Yoga Alliance Registered School providing Yoga Teacher Training including Ayurveda Principles. Transform through Yoga. Techniques to maintain your spiritual armor in today's world. Practical ways to transform yourself from a servant of the senses to a Spiritual Warrior.
